Toolbar

A singleton class available in the window namespace that lets you manipulate the TabCandy toolbar button.

Summary
ToolbarA singleton class available in the window namespace that lets you manipulate the TabCandy toolbar button.
Variables
buttonA getter that yields the toolbar button for direct manipulation.
unreadA getter/setter that allows you to get/set the number of “unread” tabs.

Variables

button

A getter that yields the toolbar button for direct manipulation.

unread

set unread(
   val
){ this._unreadCount = parseInt(val); this._render(); }, get unread(){ return this._unreadCount; } } context.Toolbar

A getter/setter that allows you to get/set the number of “unread” tabs.  This unread count gets displayed as a badge in the TabCandy icon.  Use it as such:

Toolbar.unread += 1
